name: Open with Sublime Text
description: Support you to open a file or folder directly with Sublime Text. Then, you can start coding, markuping, and prosing immediately. If you haven't installed Sublime Text, it will let you quickly get the Sublime Text installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

apps.name: Sublime Text
apps.description: Support you to open a file or folder directly with Sublime Text. Then, you can start coding, markuping, and prosing immediately. If you haven't installed Sublime Text, it will let you quickly get the Sublime Text installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

subname: Quickly open the target file or folder with Sublime Text.
